description: Updates Categories for the Amazon Q Business application environment instance. Web experience users use Categories to tag and filter library items. For more information, see Custom labels for Amazon Q Apps.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: The list of categories to be updated with their new values. (dict) --- A label that web experience users associate with a library item. Web experience users use Categories to tag and filter library items. The unique identifier of the category. The name of the category. color (string) --- The color of the category, represented as a hexadecimal value of either 3 or 6 digits.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the category.

nested_params.name: color
nested_params.description: The color of the category, represented as a hexadecimal value of either 3 or 6 digits.
